name: lund_b
description:
Unfolding of a lund_b sparse matrix into a lattice. The original matrix describes a Lund eigenvalue problem first documented by T. Johansson in 1974. In this simulation, the matrix is represented as a lattice with 147 nodes which undergoes a process of unfolding until it reaches equilibrium. 

@lukapiskorec, mp4, 1000 x 1000 pix, 200 frames
